evidence.text: Person B: A little lumpy. See, Ollie? He knows. Salamunovich says, nah, don’t worry about it, it’s just a gland. You know Salamunovich?
Person B: Must be somebody else.
Person A: Rodriguez moved to Key West, married some guy he met on his iPhone. Nestor’s his relation of some sort. A good man, and then his mother died, very sudden as I understand it.
